citations.narrative:
There were two guinea pigs, housed in separate cages in the Small Animal room, that had a mild-moderate amount of
green algae growing along the inside of their plastic water bottles that were affixed to their cages. Lack of proper
sanitization of the water bottles could allow for harmful organisms to grow, which could negatively impact the health and
well-being of the animals. All watering receptacles must be sanitized when dirty. The facility cleaned the water bottles and
increased their sanitization frequency as corrective actions.
Correct by: September 11, 2023

There were two pied degus (housed in the same cage) and two hedgehogs (housed in the same cage) in the small animal
room, and four hedgehogs (two in each cage) in the breeding/feeder room that had a mild-moderate amount of green
algae growing along the inside of their plastic water bottles that were affixed to their cages. Lack of proper sanitization of
the water bottles could allow for harmful organisms to grow, which could negatively impact the health and well-being of
the animals. All water bottles must be kept clean and sanitary. The facility cleaned the water bottles and increased their
sanitization frequency as corrective actions.
Correct by: September 11, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n
